description:
Demon King Ahriman wants to take over the world but his daughter Doux is too kind and making it difficult.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Maou no Musume wa Yasashi Sugiru!! / Maou no Musume wa Otetsudai ga Sugiru!!
The Demon King`s Daughter Is Too Kind!! / The Demon King`s Daughter Helps Too Much!!
魔王の娘は優しすぎる!! / 魔王の娘はお手伝いがすぎる!!
